general_advisory: Dry weather expected with partly cloudy sky. Mildly dry conditions prevailed. Farmers advised to maintain standing water for seedlings, irrigate fields, apply necessary insecticides and herbicides.

advisory: Manage stem borer with Trichogramma japonicum card and pheromone traps. Apply appropriate insecticides.
Manage stem rot with Validamycin drench or Captan + Hexaconazole.
Select resistant varieties for red rot. Soak setts in specified solution.
Control powdery mildew with specified sprays.
Control powdery mildew with specified sprays.
Control cut worm with specified insecticides. Dusting may be necessary.
Spray recommended insecticides for mite control.
Control aphids with neem oil or Flonicam sprays.
Manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight with specified fungicides.
Control black spot with specified fungicide.
Maintain water depth for fish hibernating. Follow specified instructions.
